00026 void Admin::createUser(User user)
00027 {
00028          QSqlQuery query;
00029          query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00030          query.prepare("INSERT INTO Users (Name,Surname,Username,Password,Role)"
00031                                           "VALUES(:Name, :Surname, :Username, :Password, :Role)");
00032          query.bindValue(":Name", user.getName());
00033          query.bindValue(":Surname", user.getSurname());
00034          query.bindValue(":Username", user.getUsername());
00035          query.bindValue(":Password", user.getPassword());
00036          query.bindValue(":Role", user.getRole());
00037          query.exec();
00038 
00039 }

00047 void Admin::editUser(User user)
00048 {
00049      QSqlQuery query;
00050 
00051              query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00052              query.prepare("UPDATE Users SET Name=:Name, Surname=:Surname, Username=:Username , Password=:Password, Role=:Role WHERE userName=:userName");
00053              query.bindValue(":Name", user.getName());
00054              query.bindValue(":Surname", user.getSurname());
00055              query.bindValue(":Username", user.getUsername());
00056              query.bindValue(":Password", user.getPassword());
00057              query.bindValue(":Role", user.getRole());

00069 void Admin::deleteUser(User user)
00070 {
00071      QSqlQuery query;
00072 
00073 
00074             query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00075             query.prepare("delete from Users where UserName= :Username");
